scripts.build:apk: npm run build && pwabuilder android --manifest ./manifest.json --package com.mritsoftware.player --name 'MRIT Player' --short-name 'MRIT' --display standalone --orientation any --theme-color '#000000' --background-color '#000000' --skipPwaValidation
scripts.capacitor:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.capacitor:android: npm run build && npx cap sync && npx cap open android
scripts.capacitor:build: npm run build && npx cap sync android
